<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Magic Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=703)
<actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** ([verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283))

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 to 3 non-magical stones or sling bullets
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You pour positive energy into ordinary stones, granting them temporary magical properties. You can target 1 non-magical stone or sling bullet for every action you use Casting this Spell. The stones must be unattended or carried by you or a willing ally. The stones become _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [sling bullets](/Weapons.aspx?ID=82)_. Each stone can be used only once, after which it crumbles to dust.
name: Magic Stone
